    • 方法详细资料

      • readFromFile

        public void readFromFile(java.io.File file)
                  throws java.lang.NumberFormatException,
                         java.io.IOException,
                         AtomElementException,
                         AtomTrackNumException,
                         AtomElectronNumException,
                         DataSyntaxException,
                         DataScientificNumberException,
                         IllegalIntimacyInSocialTieException
        Override readFromFile. Before reading from file, it's representations must be reset. This can read from legal atom structure data file.
        指定者:
        readFromFile 在接口中 CircularOrbit<Nucleus,PhysicalObject>
        覆盖:
        readFromFile 在类中 ConcreteCircularOrbit<Nucleus,PhysicalObject>
        参数:
        file - the data file
        抛出:
        DataScientificNumberException - shouldn't happen in atom structure.
        DataSyntaxException - shouldn't happen in atom structure.
        IllegalIntimacyInSocialTieException - shouldn't happen in atom structure.s
        java.lang.NumberFormatException - This exception may happen like when parameter in Integer.parseOf() doesn't match format.
        java.io.FileNotFoundException - file not found exception
        java.io.IOException - This exception may happen when read file with BufferedReader.
        AtomElementException - This exception is about nucleus element in atom structure. This includes that element of atom contains 0 or more than 2 characters, the first character is not a upper case character, or the second character is not a lower case character.
        AtomTrackNumException - This exception is about track number in atom structure. The number of track is not positive integer in data file.
        AtomElectronNumException - This exception is about electron number in atom structure. This includes that data doesn't indicate electron number for some tracks, number of track doesn't match the number of electron. information.

      • save

        public Memento<Nucleus,PhysicalObject> save()
        从接口复制的说明: CircularOrbit
        Save the current state into a Memento and return this Memento. This method should only perform in atom structure.
        指定者:
        save 在接口中 CircularOrbit<Nucleus,PhysicalObject>
        覆盖:
        save 在类中 ConcreteCircularOrbit<Nucleus,PhysicalObject>
        返回:
        a Memento storing the current state

        public void restore(Memento<Nucleus,PhysicalObject> m)
        从接口复制的说明: CircularOrbit

        指定者:
        restore 在接口中 CircularOrbit<Nucleus,PhysicalObject>

      • addRelationshipBetweenCentralAndPhysical

        public void addRelationshipBetweenCentralAndPhysical(PhysicalObject physicalObject,
                                                     boolean fromCentral,
                                                     double weight)
        This method is non-existent in atom structure.
        指定者:
        addRelationshipBetweenCentralAndPhysical 在接口中 CircularOrbit<Nucleus,PhysicalObject>
        覆盖:
        addRelationshipBetweenCentralAndPhysical 在类中 ConcreteCircularOrbit<Nucleus,PhysicalObject>
        参数:
        physicalObject - the physical object in this relationship
        fromCentral - true if the relationship is from central object to physical object, false if the relationship is from physical object to central object
        weight - the intimacy of this relationship, it should be a decimal from zero to one.

      • addRelationshipBetweenPhysicalAndPhysical

        public void addRelationshipBetweenPhysicalAndPhysical(PhysicalObject physicalObjectA,

        参数:
        physicalObjectA - the source physical object of this relationship
        physicalObjectB - the target physical object of this relationship
        weight - the intimacy of this relationship, it should be a decimal from zero to one
